name: Thief
description: A thief that can be of various types, such as different characters or individuals with specific roles.

fields.name: Thief Type
fields.description: Defines the specific type or identity of the thief.

40.name: Red Bandana
40.description: The thief wearing a red bandana.

41.name: Old Man
41.description: The thief is an old man.

42.name: Little Girl
42.description: The thief is a little girl.

fields.name: Variable 2
fields.description: Unknown variable that is associated with the thief, possibly related to the thief's behavior or other conditions.

fields.name: Cage ID
fields.description: The ID of the cage where the thief might be contained or related to.

fields.name: Thief Number
fields.description: Defines a unique identifier or number associated with the thief.
